00020 void MatrixAliasConstant::_constructMatrixAliasConstant(const double * data, const unsigned int rows, const unsigned int columns)
00021 {
00022         // Create new container
00023         m_matrixContainer = new MatrixContainer(data, rows, columns);
00024 
00025         // Create new read access object
00026         m_matrixReadAccess = new MatrixReadAccess(this);
00027 
00028         // Construct operators
00029         _constructMatrixReadOperators();
00030 
00031 
00032         #ifdef DEBUG_CONSTRUCTOR
00033                 printf("Constructed: MatrixAliasConstant::Pointer Constructor\n");
00034         #endif
00035 }
00036

00097 void MatrixAliasConstant::_constructMatrixReadOperators()
00098 {
00099         // Construct operators
00100         element._constructMatrixReadOperator(this);
00101         add._constructMatrixReadOperator(this);
00102         subtract._constructMatrixReadOperator(this);
00103         negative._constructMatrixReadOperator(this);
00104         multiply._constructMatrixReadOperator(this);
00105         divide._constructMatrixReadOperator(this);
00106         print._constructMatrixReadOperator(this);
00107         printM._constructMatrixReadOperator(this);
00108         subMatrix._constructMatrixReadOperator(this);
00109         sizeEqual._constructMatrixReadOperator(this);
00110         isSquareMatrix._constructMatrixReadOperator(this);
00111         isRowVector._constructMatrixReadOperator(this);
00112         isColumnVector._constructMatrixReadOperator(this);
00113         transpose._constructMatrixReadOperator(this);
00114         absolute._constructMatrixReadOperator(this);
00115         rowSum._constructMatrixReadOperator(this);
00116         columnSum._constructMatrixReadOperator(this);
00117         maximum._constructMatrixReadOperator(this);
00118         minimum._constructMatrixReadOperator(this);
00119         infinityNorm._constructMatrixReadOperator(this);
00120         frobeniusNorm._constructMatrixReadOperator(this);
00121         squaredElements._constructMatrixReadOperator(this);
00122 }

00215 
00216 MatrixAlias& MatrixAlias::operator+=(const MatrixAliasConstant& operand)
00217 {
00218         equals(add(operand));
00219         return *this;
00220 }
00221 
00222 MatrixAlias& MatrixAlias::operator-=(const MatrixAliasConstant& operand)
00223 {
00224         equals(subtract(operand));
00225         return *this;
00226 }
00227 
00228 MatrixAlias& MatrixAlias::operator*=(const MatrixAliasConstant& operand)
00229 {
00230         equals(multiply(operand));
00231         return *this;
00232 }
00233 
00234 MatrixAlias& MatrixAlias::operator*=(const double& operand)
00235 {
00236         equals(multiply(operand));
00237         return *this;
00238 }
00239 
00240 MatrixAlias& MatrixAlias::operator/=(const double& operand)
00241 {
00242         equals(divide(operand));
00243         return *this;
00244 }

00900         equals._constructColumnVectorWriteOperator(this);
00901         resize._constructColumnVectorWriteOperator(this);
00902 }
00903

00905 //   Destructor
00906 //------------------------
